values:
Add my new account.

radical_ld


I have already added a few of you, but you need to add me so that I can see your posts. Also...How do you make it friends only?

Help me decide. I want to cut my hair, but I don't know if I should or not.

Go to :  http://viewmorepics.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=viewImage&friendID=161230388&albumID=923230&imageID=9626281

I have officially decided that I never want to get married. It is the biggest waste of time. 

It is also not important. Neither of my parents are married and they both live with their significant others. My brother also. 


So why does it matter? Exactly...it doesn't.


I totally don't care anymore. 

I miss a lot of people. Call me please.

Josh moved out last night. I miss him a lot.


I cannot believe that his room is empty. =[


Going to Disneyland on Thursday & possibly on the circus on Wednesday. idk.


call me...maybe.

so my dad is screaming at the top of his lungs and all i can think is...."kick her out, kick her out" haha


i dont really care anymore. i am fucking happy, and it rocks. i am not really doing anything wrong. but now i am kinda scared of when the cell phone bill comes...i have been texting and i dont have texting. shit. oh well.


its hard to write a happy entry when my dad is yelling and cussing so much...crazy. weird.


happy. =]

i am ripping off my nails right now and it fucking hurts....

in other news, being seen as a responsible kid is a good thing! i get to do so much when my dad trusts me.
this time last year sucked because i was being stupid.

19 more days.

welp. washed the car. still need to clean the house. shower after that. then away to cool kids.


i am not ever going to be able to put all my eggs in one basket again, which makes me semi-sad, because its a nice feeling...just going on a whim.



i am not interested in anyone at the moment, i would like to make that clear. there is no one special in my life, nor to i plan on there being. i may swoon from time to time, but that is the extent of it. no one can bring me down. i am really happy.


also, i would like to again say happy  birthday to this amazing man:

how can i trust anyone after what has happened?

i can't, that's the problem....

boys say "let's cuddle" "i want to be with you so badly" then the hurt you and walk away.

i can't handle this again, i am so close to getting out and away from everything, he keeps pulling me back in. idk what to do/think.



i am so happy though. everything has come full circle in my life...almost. and i am really ok with that.

i am ok with the person that i have become this past year. things were great. i couldn't have asked for anything better.

things just keep getting better and i hope they stay that way.

he promises that he will never hurt me.

says that he would die if he did.

wants to be with me so badly and make me happy.





do i trust him?


7 days til we are outta there. i cannot believe that i even made it this far, and i wouldnt have if it wasnt for you guys...i love ya'll.

thank you.

prom was wonderful.


go to myspace for photos.

stressed about prom....hope everything works out. need lots...mostly money. i want to be pretty


i am going to be and auntie again. kaity's sister is preggers. i am super excited....its gunna be a boy, i am sure of it. .... i am .. haha

dont feel well...

she has a dr.'s appt tomorrow, i am going to be freaking out for most of the day. STRESS

MICHELE PREDMORE IS GOING TO MARRY ME ONE DAY! seriously.

 thank you to sarah len for the text message today, i love you

also to jenn maren for letting me make fun of you for being in band today.  =P

i spent the day with my ma today, it was much needed. i am still upset, but at the moment i am ok...you never know though...you never know.

SHE PUT A SPOON IN MY CUP! omg...funny story....i will tell some of you tomorrow, if you remind me or if your name is michele lynn predmore.


EDIT: i totally spoke too soon, it was going amazing and then she had an attack...a scary one, i knew what i had to do, but all i could think was how hard this is going to be... it just, let's just hope it doesnt come to that...**deep breath**

i TOLD you all that i had intuition. i knew something was goting to be wrong, i just didnt know how wrong. i didnt know that i would be so intune with what was going to happen.

we wont know anything until the 31st, of course, the day of my last concert. just the thought of what might happen makes me cry. i cannot handle this. 

josh...my rock...he even cried a little...i didnt know what to do, he never cries. i just need to sleep...please keep happy thoughts for me and my family. please. thank you.

is it totally pathetic that probably the only reason i am going to go to school tomorrow is to see him?

like how lame is that? normal people stay home when they feel like this, but i am going to get my ass outta bed and get ready and go to fucking school because i want to see his gorgeous smile. i cannot even lift my head to type this right now. i am laying on my stomach and my eyes are closed and my head is on a pillow.

karma.
gotta love it.


if i were bleeding right now...i would be pissed, because i went all day with nothing. if it is just going to pick and choose when things are going to happen, i really wish it would inform me.

i think i am going to die soon. i have a feeling...so lets have fun while we still can. because everything we do is our choice.

we are condemned to be free.

shallow, it seems, but i need you here
from me to you.
i know, i can't feel a thing.
sing me to sleep.
i won't find out when you leave.
i wish you were here.
desperate, it seems, but i can't breathe.
are you real?
i can't feel a thing,
and this machine wont stop.
be here when i wake.
sing me to sleep.
i won't find out when you leave.
sing me to sleep.
i won't find out.
i wish you were here.
i wish you were here.

HAPPY CINCO DE MAYO.

my day has started off wonderfully.

i love the power of aim.

and i love my best friends.




eat. drink. be merry.

worst day ever.

i dont even know where to begin.

short and sweet:
dad hates me
i am torn. 

my heart hurts.
i am lonely
i need someone.
and that is lame.
i am sick
i dont want to be here.
take me away.

how can one be lonely when they have a signifigant other?


KAITY FELL AND IT WAS HILARIOUS! oh man. best moment of my life. for serious...minus the prom asking thing...haha.


$0.31 for ice cream was quite amazing. 

my friends are also amazing.


i think i am in love with being in love. and i am over it. lalalalala

crying is stupid, having fun is SO much better. 

CINCO DE MAYO???? more like DRINKO DE MAYO!!!!!!!!!!!!

i mean what? idk WHAT you are talking about.

i dont drink and i DONT kiss boys....i play baseball...with no pants on.


i think i might be under some "mood altering substance as mr. brown likes to call it. haha 


peace love and pancakes.

I :

got asked to prom in an amazing and romantic way.

had a HUGE fight with the father and almost left my house.

have to go to dinner for the step-bitch's birthday.

made hair and make up appt for prom.

am not looking forward to school tomorrow.

miss all of the underclassmen.

really enjoy....umm...i dont remember what i was going to say. so yeah.


love you guys.

Sean Suess: you made me feel better. thank you so much. i love you. you are wonderful.

Sarah Len: i am so happy for you. YAY! omg. we have to have a girls night and dish!

Michele Predmore: Congrats on college. i am so proud of you. I love you and will miss you every single moment you are gone.

Stacy: I love you. i miss you. i hope things get better. and i know they will...27 more days!

Mason: I MISSED YOU! i am glad you are back! YAY!

Amanda Chinn: Apples to Apples. you know the place, i will call you with the date and time. i am glad you are home.

Bonnie: i enjoyed peeing with you. i am in the emotional boat with you.

Danielle:  i have my dress and when it gets fixed i will post a picture.



My nose still hurts, but its getting better. i am in a weird mood. tired.

i love my friends.

i miss the choir kids.

i hate losers.


that sums it up.

SPRING BREAK RULES/RULED.

tomorrow=shopping and awesome party.

I love sarah len


hogan knows best

sometimes i just need to look like a librarian. ok? ok.



i got a red bra, and i think i love it. actually, i know i love it.


i also got  the perfect prom dress!

photo's to come.

so i was about to eat a FUN DIP thing that i got for easter and then i read what flavor it is:

SUPER SASSY STRAWBERRY/ Fresa.

I <3 candy.


i got a prom dress. its green, and sparkly, and cute. and very similar to the one that i wore to formal, only prettier.
EDIT: I GOT THE PERFECT PROM DRESS AND ITS AMAZING AND I LOVE MY MA WITH ALL MY HEART OMG OMG OMG


i also got a hair cute  (most of them, actually)




call me sometime this week.


I MISS KAITY and i will MISS DOMINIC.

so the spring trip was awesome. 

as of monday i was the strong one. i had everything together, and nothing was going completely wrong...

Then:
i failed
dropped my grade
didnt get a dress
cried
got sick
cried more
got sicker
felt stupid
felt betrayed(old feeling surfacing)
realized that i am still alone after almost a year
realized that i am not going to be with someone again for a long time and that i am undesirable

Now:
still sick
saw my mom, grandparents, cousin (they made me feel better)
spring break is right around the corner
going to hang out with people no matter what. NO MATTER WHAT. esp Weiner #1, Meener, and Noel.
if you see me tomorrow, please give me a big hug, esp if your name starts with L and ends with auren...(Lauren...DIKE!)

and when i sit on it, i have weird/artistic thoughts.


so there is a photo of me, with the bench in the backround.

went to the beach with awesome friends.

went to kait's show. amazing. i love santa sue.

went to kait's house and took care of drunk friend.

came home.

thought about a certain someone.

thought about the future.

thought about tunnel wishes.

thanks for everything tonight you guys, i love all of you. 


looking forward to the next few weeks/weekends.

i'm tired.

i think he knows.

i heart band.



I LOVE THIS GIRL!




just wanted to let ya'll know.

Drained. Tired. Full of love.

i love all of you. in seperate ways, but you are all in my heart.

thank you all so much for making me smile, and being your wonderful selves.

I am sorry if i made any of you cry, but i hope that i did make all of you think. especially some of you.

drinking isnt worth it. i have seen both sides of the story. i have been drunk, and i have driven with a drunk driver.

and i have felt what happens when things go wrong, not realistically, but as much as a person can. getting the chance to write that letter,

no its not the first time, because God knows i have written more than one goodbye letter. but knowing that this one was going to be heard

by my loved ones (you guys) and not just crumpled up, made me more honest and open. I am glad that you were there to hear it. i have a

new lease on life. i am very excited for the up coming weeks. things are going to be good. =]

thanks sarah, nikki & crystal for last night, ya'll made my night.

borat is really funny, i dont care what my grandma says.

yesterday: Sleepover in the bandroom. michele, kristen and the Bestmeister. "R" party. Kareoke. 300!!! Ryan, Ali, Christene, Mark, Casey, Jack L.

today: HP & the Gob w/ Christene & Mason. Picked up stephen. Played Wii. Ali, Elana, Mason, Christene, Stephen, Sean, Jow, Michelle & Courtney. Carl's JR. Sarah, Stacy, & Ryan Steele.

tomorrow: Lounging.

Sunday: Brunch with jewish family (which means lox & bagels) : ]


love life: i <3 cute boy.

life in general: happy. content. a little sad about being alone, but not depressed.



ok seriously....300 is the best movie i have seen since The Departed. i literally screamed "FUCK YEAH" at the screen. i recommend it to all of you over 17 (there is a pretty graphic sex scene and its fucking GORY!) 

note to self: i owe mason $10, and christene $6.


"the quickest way to a man's heart?"

"THROUGH HIS CHEST!" ::thrusts hand through chest & pulls out heart::

"HELL YES!"

smiles.



that's all.
no reason.
just smiles.

fights, tears, hatrid.

i cant do anything about any of that.

he makes me happy, and he doesnt even know that i exist. and i am totally fine with that.


: ]

tonight was pretty good.


i had a bit of a breakdown with my dad, but then i went to santa sues alice and wonderland play (which was hilarious) then to carl's jr with kaity and katy mac and we made fun of all the 12 year olds being retarded over there.

so on the way home we drove by  kyle's house, so i called meaghann and told her to come outside where she informed me that Ethan (ironically my cousin's nephew, which we found out one day a long time ago when kyle's mom was babysitting) was there, so i went inside to say hi to him, and kyle's mom and all that jazz...it was good, i havent been there in awhile, they got a new coffee table. 

i would say that today was a good day. 

i hope that vchb went well for everyone. and i missed all of you on thursday.

MY INFAMOUS VOICEMAIL HAS BEEN CHANGED! 

call me to hear it...its so funny!

i was sick, but now i am better...almost.

i hung out with bonnie, went to my grandma's (with bonnie) had fun with my entire family (almost) and then went to this park in the middle of nowhere with these awesome guys....it was fun.

sarah and bonnie visited me last night and made me happy. 

i saw someone who i didnt want to. YUCK! blech. anyways....yeah. 

have a good day tomorrow.
Can I be your memory?

i need to have a crush on someone.

to keep my mind busy.

suggestions?

thank you to the alliterate lovers for making my dream come true

and thank you to all of those who cheered for us. 

and to the judges (mainly christine) for third place.


that was the single most invigorating moment of my life (so far)

i need love.

i need caring.

i need sympathy.

i need forgiveness.

i really need compassion.

i have very little of all of these things in my life.

and those who i receive it from come few and far in between.

Sarah, Bonnie, Michele, Matt, Mason, Danielle, Angela, Stacy, Crystal, Jenn, Stephen, Amanda, Nikki i need help.

please.

i am going in a downward spiral and fast.

i have nowhere else to turn.

no one to turn too.

i may be reluctant to actually talk about it in person,

which is why i am writing this.

i legitimately need your help to get better,

 i have never been this bad before.

please help me.

all i can do to save myself is ask you guys for help.

it is one of the hardest thing for a person to do

but it is necessary for my survival.

i hope you understand and do not judge me

thank you for loving me and blessing me with amazing friendships.

thursday night (santa sue's formal)





Friday night(royal's formal)

sarah: i hope things get better for you, and i am sorry that i am not there for you like i should be. i love you so much


there are things that you talk about and things that you hide
things that you share on myspace or livejournal and things you dont

i dont/wont.


very bad situation last night.

oh.....


oh.....

oh.....

OH and By the way betch...FUCK YOU!!!!


hahaha.


dont be such a DECK!
I CARE IF YOU LIKE ME. you are definitely one of the coolest kids i know, definitely.

http://s76.photobucket.com/albums/j22/kaitVick/?action=view&current=MVI_2669.flv

i love this girl so friggen much, seriously. you all need to meet her or something! ha


i dont care if no one likes me anymore.

over it!

I apologize to those of you who read my last entry, I was overwhelmed and not thinking clearly.

I am ...well there is really no excuse. but I am sorry. and I really do not wish that about anyone. I shouldnt have written that. and I am sorry if I offended any of you.

wish on a time
wish on a star
wish on candles
wish on a necklace

what's the fucking point. i mean what is wishing going to get me...nothing, i have been wishing for years and i have never got what i wanted

"i wish that my parents would get back together" - the wish from my childhood
"i wish that i could find someone that can accept me" - the wish from jr high
"i wish that kyle and i would stay together forever and get married and have kids as planned" -  the wish from most of high school
"i wish that something good would come along." - the wish from senior year?

something needs to change.


got my formal dress, i need to have it altered, if anyone can help me...i'd appreciate it. (its a little big in the top)

going stag, of course, like i could get a date. haha! RIIIIIGHT!


tired of having undefined relationships with people....friend? with benefits? girlfriend? make up your mind. please.
